regen.absent_element: details on the error highlighting process in the data review wizard
regen.new_specification: The system shall specify conditions and procedures for highlighting errors in the data review wizard when comparing incoming data with existing data.

regen.absent_element: action of defining severity levels for validation errors
regen.new_specification: The system shall categorize validation errors by severity.

regen.absent_element: automation and management of batch processing
regen.new_specification: The system should automatically initiate and manage batch processing of validation tasks without manual intervention.

label: Configuring data validation rules shall be a privileged operation.
absence: action of granting privilege to configuring data validation rules
